result.eng: There is only a shower in the bathroom.
result.ga: níl ach cithfholcadán sa seomra folctha
result.orig: níl ach cithfholcadán sa seomra folctha
result.html: níl ach cithfholcadán sa seomra folcthaThere is only a shower in the bathroom.
result.ponchtml: níl aċ ciṫḟolcadán sa seomra folcṫaThere is only a shower in the bathroom.

result.eng: I have a shower, I put my clothes on, I brush my teeth, and so on.
result.ga: bíonn cithfholcadh agam cuirim orm mo chuid éadaí glanaim mo chuid fiacla agus mar sin de
result.orig: bíonn cithfholcadh agam cuirim orm mo chuid éadaí glanaim mo chuid fiacla agus mar sin de
result.html: bíonn cithfholcadh agam cuirim orm mo chuid éadaí glanaim mo chuid fiacla agus mar sin deI have a shower, I put my clothes on, I brush my teeth, and so on.
result.ponchtml: bíonn ciṫḟolcaḋ agam cuirim orm mo ċuid éadaí glanaim mo ċuid fiacla agus mar sin deI have a shower, I put my clothes on, I brush my teeth, and so on.

result.eng: Well, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ga: bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.orig: bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.html: bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadhWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ponchtml: ḃuel is í an teilifís an ḟaḋb mar sin mura ḃfuil tú ag caiṫeaṁ an iomarca ama sa gciṫḟolcaḋWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
